content: The next crucial element to include in your written request for an extension of time is the details of the delay. You need to provide a clear and concise explanation of what caused the delay and how it affected your ability to complete the project on time. Be sure to include any supporting evidence, such as weather reports or delivery receipts, that can help bolster your case. It is essential to be as specific as possible when describing the delay and its impact on the project timeline. This will help the other party better understand the situation and make an informed decision about whether to grant the extension of time.
